actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Warner for Senator McClure. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 810.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1999.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1999 (Wolf Trap Filene Center reconstruction).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1999.
